name: Better editor comments
description: Makes numerous changes to comments in the Scratch editor: fixes a bug where comments attached to blocks don't save their positions correctly after dragging, prevents block comments from spawning off-screen in large scripts, keeps block comment connections straight, and more.

settings.name: Fix dragging blocks with comments
settings.description: Fixes a bug where if you move a block with a comment attached to it, the comment will appear to move with it initially, but then jump back to where it was before once you switch sprites or reload the project.

settings.name: Add scroll bars
settings.description: Adds scroll bars to long comments and allows you to scroll through them with the scroll wheel.

settings.name: Directly edit standalone comments
settings.description: Fixes a problem with comments that are not attached to blocks where if you click to edit a comment's contents, the text caret will not always get placed where you click.

settings.name: Always spawn block comments next to block
settings.description: Normally, if you add a comment attached to a block and there are any blocks below it in the same script that are longer, the comment will be placed to the right of those blocks and potentially end up off-screen, even if it has room to be placed next to the block you're attaching it to. With this setting, comments will always be inserted right next to the block you're attaching it to.

settings.name: Keep connections straight
settings.description: Keeps the line connecting comments to blocks horizontal.
